global.description: Learn and communicate with people from diverse cultures and languages.

translation.title: üåç Real-time Translation
translation.description: Communicate with people worldwide without language barriers through real-time translation.

level.description: Check if your pronunciation level is appropriate for effective communication with others.

customLearning.heading: Customized Conversation Learning
customLearning.description: We provide an efficient learning environment through matching partners based on your language level.

randomMatching.heading: Random Matching
randomMatching.description: Meet new friends and learn languages through random matching with users worldwide.

culturalExchange.heading: Cultural Exchange
culturalExchange.description: Experience diverse cultures through meeting new people.

pronunciationTest.heading: Pronunciation Assessment Test
pronunciationTest.description: Enhance your language skills with LinkLing's pronunciation assessment test.

realTimeTranslation.heading: Real-time Translation & Pronunciation Check
realTimeTranslation.description: Break down language barriers with LinkLing's real-time translation API.

unityChat.heading: Unity Environment Link (Chat)
unityChat.description: Enjoy an immersive chat experience in LinkLing's Unity-based virtual environment.

features.title: LinkLing Features
features.description: LinkLing is a platform where users can learn languages by communicating in real-time with people of various nationalities in a Unity-based environment.

future.title: The Future of Language Learning
future.description: Achieve language proficiency improvement with LinkLing.
